title: Browser Syncjacking Chrome Extensions
summary: Browser Syncjacking is a method where attackers use Chrome extensions to control devices. This threat is significant for users with little tech knowledge, as it can lead to data theft and system control.

recommendations.name: Audit Browser Extensions
recommendations.rationale: Auditing browser extensions helps identify and remove potentially harmful extensions, reducing the risk of data theft.

specific_offerings.name: Google Chrome
specific_offerings.summary: Security settings to block suspicious sites.

specific_offerings.name: Mozilla Firefox
specific_offerings.summary: Enhanced security features for safer browsing.
